semantics.label: Description
semantics.default: បញ្ចូលគោលដៅដែលអ្នកចង់ទទួលបាន

semantics.label: Define goal link text
semantics.description: Text that will be displayed on the button for creating a new goal.
semantics.default: បង្កើតគោលដៅថ្មីមួយ

semantics.label: Label for a user defined goal
semantics.description: Text that will be displayed as label on a user created goal.
semantics.default: គោលដៅដែលបានកំណត់ដោយអ្នកប្រើ

semantics.label: Define goal placeholder
semantics.description: Text that will be displayed as a placeholder when creating a new goal.
semantics.default: សរសេរទីនេះ...

semantics.label: Text indicating how many goals has been added
semantics.default: គោលដៅដែលបានបន្ថែម:
semantics.description: This text will follow after the amount of goals that is currently created, example: 'Goals added: 5' where 'Goals added:' is this text.

semantics.label: Text for "Specify goal"-button
semantics.default: ការបញ្ជាក់

semantics.label: Label for help text
semantics.description: Label for showing additional helpful information to the user.
semantics.default: ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម

semantics.label: Fill in additional help information
semantics.description: Here you can fill in additional helpful information for the user.

fields.label: Header
fields.default: អះអាងពីការលុប

fields.label: Message
fields.default: តើអ្នកពិតជាចង់លុបគោលដៅនេះមែនទេ?
